ygData.subject: Re: Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Truly, it is sad to see you resort to childish insults as a last resort after being profoundly beaten in argument. I m just glad that most people on this
ygData.messageBody:
Rich Mulawa wrote:
>
> From: Rich Mulawa <richard.mulawa@...>
>
> Hey I have one simple answer for you aside from kiss my rosey pink ass!

Truly, it is sad to see you resort to childish insults as a last resort
after being profoundly beaten in argument.

I'm just glad that most people on this list are reasonable (as is proper
for Wizards) and oppose such restrictions on in-game freedom as you
propose.

As I said, I frown on twinking, but I will fight to preserve in-game
freedom and keep EQ flexible and unpredictable.

--
Sergey
--

KPS, PUNK (Paramilitary Undercover Nuclear Kamikaze)
